short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get inspired daily with customizable quotes tailored to fit your style and boost your motivation!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
----- Features -----

* More than 1000 quotes.
* Custom color scheme.
* Clean design with a quote in each new tab.
* Next quote, favorite and copy buttons.
* No adds included.
* Available offline.
* No login required.

----------------------------

For ideas, bugs, or feedback visit the GitHub issues page.
For detailed version log visit the GitHub repository releases.

GitHub repository: https://github.com/juanhdzma/TabQuotes
